arts.ttl: Alan Shearer fires back at Pep Guardiola after Man City boss clashes with Newcastle stars
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola felt aggrieved by a refereeing decision that went against Manchester City in their defeat by Newcastle, but Alan Shearer was keen to highlight a different factor

arts.ttl: Howe finally beats Guardiola - how Newcastle stopped Man City
arts.sum: After previously "trying everything", Newcastle manager Eddie Howe beats Pep Guardiola's Manchester City for the first time in the top flight at his 17th attempt.

arts.ttl: Ruben Dias fumes at VAR as Man City star calls for rule change after Newcastle controversy
arts.sum: Manchester City were furious that referee Sam Barrott and the VAR did not rule out Harvey Barnes' second goal for Newcastle after Gianluigi Donnarumma was pushed

arts.ttl: BBC Sport comments from ‘neutrals’ on Newcastle United after 2-1 win vs Manchester City
arts.sum: Interesting to read through these BBC Sport comments, following on from Newcastle United winning 2-1 against Manchester City. The comments from neutrals especially telling… A lot of it different to... You can click here to read the full article. Source

arts.ttl: Newcastle 'close to our best' in win over Man City - Howe
arts.sum: Newcastle United boss Eddie Howe is delighted after his "brave and ambitious" side were "close to their best" in their 2-1 win over Manchester City at St James' Park.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola reveals what he REALLY told Newcastle stars and referee in angry confrontation
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola clashed with Newcastle players Joelinton and Bruno Guimaraes in tetchy scenes on the pitch after Manchester City were beaten 2-1 at St James' Park

arts.ttl: Instant Newcastle United fan/writer reaction after Newcastle 2 Manchester City 1
arts.sum: Newcastle 2 Manchester City 1 – Saturday 22 November 2025 5.30pm Instant fan/writer reaction from some of our regular contributors on The Mag. Nat Seaton: ‘What a game!! The REAL... You can click here to read the full article. Source

arts.ttl: Manchester City 1 Newcastle 2: City player ratings as City lose.
arts.sum: The City player ratings reflect City’s performance which was frustrating in a game that they needed to win for their own self-belief. Manchester City will be frustrated at themselves for squandering a host of good chances throughout the game.

arts.ttl: Newcastle 2 Manchester City 1 and as Sally said when she met Harry: “Yes, Yes, Yes!”
arts.sum: Newcastle 2 Manchester City 1 – Saturday 22 November 2025 5.30pm A fantastic, fighting performance by Newcastle United confounded expectations at St James’ Park and secured all three points against... You can click here to read the full article. Source

arts.ttl: Barnes fires Newcastle to victory against Man City
arts.sum: Harvey Barnes scores twice as Newcastle put a dent in Manchester City's title charge and grab three points in the Premier League at St James' Park.
